PATIENT_ID: TEST_NEUROSURG_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-18 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-18 10:10:00
Category III activation for 60-year-old female. Ground-level fall.
Isolated right ankle injury. No loss of consciousness.
BP 138/84, HR 74, RR 14, GCS 15.
Alert and oriented. No neurologic concerns.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-18 10:30:00
Right ankle x-ray: lateral malleolus fracture.
No other imaging indicated.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-18 10:50:00
Ankle fracture. Splinted. Orthopedic follow-up. Discharged.
